snippet: The world's advanced economies are on the brink of a major slowdown, threatening the Japanese economy, the governor of the Bank of Japan said.
lead_paragraph: The world's advanced economies are on the brink of a major slowdown, threatening the Japanese economy, the governor of the Bank of Japan said.

headline.main: Japan's Central Bank Sounds Warning on Global Economy
headline.print_headline: Japan, Facing Billions More for Rebuilding, Looks for Ways to Pay for It
